constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 115 (Wednesday, July 13, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BUDD:
H.R. 8353.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, the Congress shall have power to lay
and collect taxes, duties, imposts and excises, to pay the
debts and provide for the common defense and general welfare
of the United States; but all duties, imposts and excises
shall be uniform throughout the United States;
[[Page H6336]]
[Page H6335]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: Pay Victims Not Prisoners Act
